mapper.select: select product_code , jm_hash_id from cms_bt_jm_promotion_product a where exists (select 1 from (select max(id) as id from cms_bt_jm_promotion_product where channel_id = #{channelId} and jm_hash_id != '' group by product_code) as b where a.id=b.id)
select product_code , max(origin_jm_hash_id) as jm_hash_id from cms_bt_jm_product where channel_id = #{channelId} and origin_jm_hash_id != '' group by product_code
mapper.update: UPDATE `cms_bt_jm_promotion` AS a SET `brand`=( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT IFNULL(c.brand_name,'')) FROM cms_bt_jm_promotion_product AS b JOIN `cms_bt_jm_product` AS c ON c.`channel_id`=b.`channel_id` AND c.`product_code`=b.`product_code` WHERE b.`cms_bt_jm_promotion_id`=a.`id` ) WHERE a.id=#{id}
